long_description: Headed for adventures in hot, humid weather? The Columbia Insect Blocker Cachalot hat with cape helps stave off sunburns and bug bites with sun and bug protection built right into the fabric. Lightweight, quick-dry ripstop nylon fabric features an internal headband that wicks moisture away from skin; sun cape increases coverage to the nape of your neck. Insect Blocker(TM) fabric treatment helps keep biting and potentially disease-carrying insects at bay. Insect Blocker uses permethrin which is a man-made version of a natural insect repellent found in a type of chrysanthemum plant. Built-in Omni-Shade(TM) UPF 30 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: Headed for adventures in hot, humid weather? The Columbia Insect Blocker Cachalot hat with cape helps stave off sunburns and bug bites with sun and bug protection built right into the fabric.
